app.name: SimplyCaster
app.description: A podcast/conversation recording platform focused on simplicity, audio quality, and deployment on private servers

room.title: Recording Room
room.subtitle: Professional podcast recording space
room.shareRoomLink: Share the room link to invite others to join.

archive.title: Recording Archive
archive.subtitle: Manage and download your room recordings
archive.noRecordingsMessage: Start recording in a room to see recordings here
archive.deleteRecordingConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this recording? This action cannot be undone.

feed.title: Podcast Feed
feed.subtitle: Manage your podcast episodes and RSS feed
feed.noEpisodesMessage: Upload your first episode to get started
feed.deleteEpisodeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this episode? This action cannot be undone and will remove it from the RSS feed.

uploadDialog.dragAndDrop: Click to upload or drag and drop
uploadDialog.invalidFileType: Please upload an MP3, OGG, or WebM audio file.

crew.title: Crew Management
crew.subtitle: Manage team members, roles, and room access
crew.noMembersMessage: Start by inviting team members to join

inviteDialog.title: Invite Guest to Room
inviteDialog.noActiveRoomsMessage: You need to create a room first before inviting guests. Guests can only be invited to active rooms.
inviteDialog.inviteInfo: The guest will receive an email with a magic link to join the selected room. The link will expire after the specified duration.
inviteDialog.guestPermissions: Guests have limited permissions and can only participate in the room they're invited to.

createHostDialog.title: Create New Host
createHostDialog.hostInfo: The new host will receive an email with instructions to complete their account setup. They will need to create a password and verify their email address.
createHostDialog.permissionsInfo: Host permissions can be modified later from the crew management page.

crew.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this crew member? This action cannot be undone and will revoke all their access.

invite.title: You're Invited!
invite.subtitle: Join the SimplyCaster room and start recording

invite.invalidMessage: This invitation link is not valid.
invite.expiredMessage: This invitation link has expired and is no longer valid.
invite.roomNotActiveMessage: The room you were invited to is not currently active.
invite.contactHost: Please contact the host to start the room, or wait for the room to become active.
invite.nameVisible: This name will be visible to other participants in the room
invite.guestInfo: As a guest, you'll have access to participate in the room recording. Your access is temporary and will expire automatically.
invite.permissionsInfo: Make sure your microphone and camera permissions are enabled for the best experience.
